title: Commands
description: You can use commands as an effective way for you to display information to your chatters, they can be triggered by typing the command name in chat.
deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete command

name.helper: This must appear at the beginning of a message to trigger the command.

response.helper: This is what you respond with in chat. You can use our <DOC_LINK_REPLACE>command variables</DOC_LINK_REPLACE> to make interesting responses.

globalCooldown.helper: How long all chatters must wait to trigger this command again.

userCooldown.helper: How long a single user must wait to trigger this command again.

mode.helper: When your command is able to be triggered in chat.

userlevels.helper: If a user has any of these roles, they are able to trigger the command.
